# Module Rebuilder

Modernize existing modules to CQRS architecture. Extracts workflows, migrates from Service pattern to MediatR handlers, implements FluentValidation, and achieves 100% module independence.

## Instructions
See: `_bmad/module-agents/agents/module-rebuilder.md`

## Model
gpt-4o

## Tools
create_file, read_file, list_dir, file_search, grep_search, semantic_search, replace_string_in_file, multi_replace_string_in_file, list_code_usages, get_errors
